file.name: example-openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  x-audience: who-cares
  version: 1.0.0
  title: API Title
  license:
    name: GNU
paths:
  /pet:
    patch:
      description: update a pet
      operationId: update-pet
      tags: [foo]
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
          content: {}
        '500':
          description: server error
          content:
            application/problem+json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'https://opensource.zalando.com/problem/schema.yaml#/Problem'

Error: parse: paths: /pet: patch: update-pet: responses: 500: content: application/problem+json: schema: parse schema: reference "https://opensource.zalando.com/problem/schema.yaml#/Problem": resolve reference "https://opensource.zalando.com/problem/schema.yaml#/Problem": invalid schema reference "https://opensource.zalando.com/problem/schema.yaml#/Problem"
